attacks.name: Play Search
attacks.effect: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, choose 1 of them, and put it into your hand. Put the 4 other cards back on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Ultra Evolution
attacks.effect: Search your deck for Alakazam and put it onto Abra (this counts as evolving Abra). Shuffle your deck afterward.
